body_html: Wasn't the macro version using malloc for the counters too? If the only thing that makes them equal is using SmallVector (which is an "algorithmic change" wrt the old impl), then there might be other overheads that we could get rid of.
body_text: Wasn't the macro version using malloc for the counters too? If the only thing that makes them equal is using SmallVector (which is an "algorithmic change" wrt the old impl), then there might be other overheads that we could get rid of.
body: Wasn't the macro version using `malloc` for the counters too? If the only thing that makes them equal is using `SmallVector` (which is an "algorithmic change" wrt the old impl), then there might be other overheads that we could get rid of.
